Moose::Autobox::Hash(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Moose::Autobox::Hash(3)

NAME

Moose::Autobox::Hash - the Hash role

SYNOPOSIS

  use Moose::Autobox;
  
  print { one => 1, two => 2 }->keys->join(', '); # prints 'one, two'

DESCRIPTION

This is a role to describes a Hash value.

METHODS

delete
merge
Takes a hashref and returns a new hashref with right precedence shallow merging.
hslice
Slices a hash but returns the keys and values as a new hashref.
flatten

Indexed implementation

at
put
exists
keys
values
kv
slice
each
each_key
each_value
each_n_values
meta
print
say

BUGS

All complex software has bugs lurking in it, and this module is no exception. If you find a bug please either email me, or add the bug to cpan-RT.
